column14: 2015 at the geesey-ferguson funeral home chapel for terry slim quibodeaux
column16: who died at 5:25 p. m. friday
column18: 2015 at his residence in crowley. rev. gerard morgan will conduct the services. visitation may be observed on sunday from 3:00 p. m. until 8:00 p. m. and monday from 8:00 a. m. until service time. slim was born august 2
column20: la. he was a veteran of the united states army and served his country during the vietnam war and was a member of the vfw. he worked most of his life in the oilfield. he is survived by his life partner of 21 years shirley leblanc of crowley; daughter amber quibodeaux of egan
column21: la; sister natasha darce` of conroe
column22: tx and a brother richard quibodeaux of crowley
column23: la. he was preceded in death by his son jason wade quibodeaux and his parents james & mary rose klumpp quibodeaux.
